medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient presents with 1 day of RUQ pain that began after a steak and lobster roll lunch at 1pm yesterday, becoming severe at 10pm. She experienced nausea and vomiting around 11 pm, with 6 episodes of emesis. The pain has been constant in the RUQ, reported as severe at its worst and is non-radiating. No fevers, chills, chest pain, or shortness of breath reported.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Chronic systolic heart failure, coronary artery disease, hypertension, dyslipidemia, diabetes complicated by nephropathy, left bundle branch block, moderate mitral regurgitation.
medical_history.family_history: Brother died at age ___ from myocardial infarction. Father died suddenly in his ___ in ___ (unknown cause).
